Uses of Package
de.axnsoftware.settings

  • Packages that use de.axnsoftware.settings 
    Package Description
    de.axnsoftware.settings  
    de.axnsoftware.settings.impl  
    de.axnsoftware.settings.impl.accessor  
    de.axnsoftware.settings.impl.visitor  
  • Classes in de.axnsoftware.settings used by de.axnsoftware.settings 
    Class and Description
    EFileFormat
    The enum EFileFormat defines the various file formats that can be read from or written out by implementations of the IBackingStoreWrapper interface.
    IBackingStore
    The interface IBackingStore models a wrapper for a backing store which is responsible for both loading and storing configuration data.
    ISettings
    The interface ISettings models a service by which one can access properties loaded from the underlying ISettingsStore and it provides a simple workflow for maintaining pending changes, discarding pending changes and finally, finalizing these pending changes.
    ISettingsStore
    The interface ISettingsStore models a service for loading and storing properties from and to an underlying backing store represented by an instance of the IBackingStore interface.
    SettingsStoreFactory
    The final class SettingsStoreFactory models a factory for instances of type ISettingsStore.
  • Classes in de.axnsoftware.settings used by de.axnsoftware.settings.impl 
    Class and Description
    EFileFormat
    The enum EFileFormat defines the various file formats that can be read from or written out by implementations of the IBackingStoreWrapper interface.
    IBackingStore
    The interface IBackingStore models a wrapper for a backing store which is responsible for both loading and storing configuration data.
    ISettings
    The interface ISettings models a service by which one can access properties loaded from the underlying ISettingsStore and it provides a simple workflow for maintaining pending changes, discarding pending changes and finally, finalizing these pending changes.
    ISettingsStore
    The interface ISettingsStore models a service for loading and storing properties from and to an underlying backing store represented by an instance of the IBackingStore interface.
  • Classes in de.axnsoftware.settings used by de.axnsoftware.settings.impl.accessor 
    Class and Description
    IBackingStore
    The interface IBackingStore models a wrapper for a backing store which is responsible for both loading and storing configuration data.
    ITypeMapper
    The interface ITypeMapper models a mapper that is responsible for reading and writing a given object from and to a given backing store.
  • Classes in de.axnsoftware.settings used by de.axnsoftware.settings.impl.visitor 
    Class and Description
    ITypeMapper
    The interface ITypeMapper models a mapper that is responsible for reading and writing a given object from and to a given backing store.
